item.title: Consensys
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The market-leading blockchain technology company founded by Ethereum co-founder Joe Lubin, responsible for the critical infrastructure (MetaMask, Infura, Linea) powering the decentralized web.
